title: 148864129.the Hard Thing About The Hard Things
excerpt: Elon Musk has said that the most difficult thing Tesla has done hasn’t been to make an affordable electric car, but to build the facilty to build a fleet of electric cars.

children.text: that the most difficult thing Tesla has done hasn’t been to make an affordable electric car, but to build the facilty to build a fleet of electric cars.
You can’t learn that kind of thing by going to business school.
Only by doing. And staying at it long enough to learn from what doesn’t work.
